mapper.sql: a.id, a.procInstId, o.id AS "office.id", o.name AS "office.name", u.id AS "applicant.id", u.name AS "applicant.name", p.id AS "project.id", p.itemNo AS "project.itemNo", p.name AS "project.name", t.id AS "together.id", t.name AS "together.name", a.beginDate, a.endDate, a.IDNo, a.remark, a.type, m.id AS "manager.id", m.name AS "manager.name", a.phone, a.status, a.managerFlag, a.FAFlag, a.ManagerComment, a.FAComment
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=a.applicantId JOIN sys_user t ON t.id=a.togetherId JOIN sys_user m ON m.id=a.managerId JOIN sys_office o ON o.id=a.officeId JOIN fa_project p ON p.id=a.projectId
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fa_businesstrip_application a
WHERE a.procInstId = #{procInstId}
ORDER BY a.beginDate ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fa_businesstrip_application( id, procInstId, officeId, applicantId, projectId, togetherId, beginDate, endDate, IDNo, remark, type, managerId, phone, status, managerFlag, FAFlag, ManagerComment, FAComment ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInstId}, #{office.id}, #{applicant.id}, #{project.id}, #{together.id}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{IDNo}, #{remark}, #{type}, #{manager.id}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{managerFlag}, #{FAFlag}, #{ManagerComment}, #{FAComment} )

INSERT INTO fa_businesstrip_reservation( id, applicationId, type, city, workPlace, beginDate, endDate, days, remark, createDate, updateDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applicationId}, #{type}, #{city}, #{workPlace}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{days}, #{remark}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )

INSERT INTO fa_businesstrip_airticket( id, applicationId, flyDate, applyDate, amount, remark, startLocation, arrivedLocation, updateDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applicationId}, #{flyDate}, #{applyDate}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{startLocation}, #{arrivedLocation}, #{updateDate} )

INSERT INTO fa_businesstrip_hotel( id, applicationId, hotel, address, contact, contactPhone, staff, createDate, updateDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applicationId}, #{hotel}, #{address}, #{contact}, #{contactPhone}, #{staff}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
